summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to a recipient at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO NYS) regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. The sender requests the creation of a non-testifying witness folder for an individual (whose name is redacted) and includes attached notes from a call with that individual.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email's subject references 'Maxwell NTW material', indicating the communication pertains to her case. She is the central figure the legal materials concern.

events.title: Email regarding Maxwell witness materials
events.description: An email is sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York requesting the creation of a non-testifying witness folder and inclusion of notes from a call with a redacted individual.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated May 17, 2021, sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The subject matter pertains to Ghislaine Maxwell and the handling of materials for a 'non-testifying witness'.
An attachment titled 'Notes from Call with [redacted]' was included, indicating prior communication with a potential witness.
The email demonstrates ongoing case preparation and witness management by prosecutors in the Maxwell case in 2021.
